Scene:
Jihei's House
(Tenma kamiya uchi / 天満紙屋内)

Play: The Love Suicides at Amijima (心中天網島)

Production: January 1973

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Toyotake Komatsudayū II (豊竹小松大夫 (二))

Takemoto Koshijidayū IV (竹本越路大夫 (四))



Shamisen Players:

Nozawa Katsuhei II (see also Nozawa Kizaemon III) (野澤勝平 (二))

Nozawa Kizaemon II (野澤喜左衛門 (二))
